name: AudioFormatInfo
desc: A specifier for the kAudioFormatProperty_FormatList property.

items.name: init(mASBD: AudioStreamBasicDescription, mMagicCookie: UnsafeRawPointer, mMagicCookieSize: UInt32)
var mMagicCookie: UnsafeRawPointer
items.desc: A pointer to the decompression information for the data described in the mASBD parameter.

items.name: var mMagicCookieSize: UInt32
items.desc: The size, in bytes, of the mMagicCookie parameter.
